metadata.title: Disney Cars Boys’ 3 Pack T-Shirts for Toddler and Little Kids – Blue/Yellow/Red/White
features: Officially Licensed Disney Cars Boy Clothes
Dress Your Little Boy in This Trendy and Fashionable Disney Cars 3 Pack T-Shirts for Toddler and Little Kids. The Perfect Disney Cars Boys’ Fashion Tops, Tees & Shirts

Contains One Cute Disney Cars “Lightning” Print Blue, White and Red Tee, One Cozy Disney Cars “Lightning McQueen” Print Tie Dye Yellow T-Shirt and One Comfy Disney Cars “Lightning” Print Tie Dye Red Tee

Dress Your Little Boy in These Cool and Stylish Tees Featuring His Favorite Cars Character; Lightning McQueen! Perfect as 2T Boys Clothes, 3T Boy Clothes, Size 4 Boys Clothes, Size 5 Boy Clothes, Size 6 Boy Clothes and Size 7 Boy Clothes

The Perfect Boys’ Outfit for Spring and Summer Season. An Ideal Gift for Your Son or Grandson. He Will Absolutely Adore! Perfect Gift for Cars Birthday, Christmas and Many Other Occasions! Match Your Little Boy Clothes with His Favorite Cars Toys, Cars Birthday Party Supplies, Cars Shoes, Cars Socks and Cars Costume
description: SOFT STRETCH FABRICCars Lightning McQueen T-Shirts offer a good amount of stretch and room to allow full-range body movements. It stretches with your son's body and instantly goes back to its original shape afterward; able to retain the perfect fit despite frequent washing and children's non-stop activities!FEATURES:Soft CrewneckShort SleevesDouble-Needle HemRelaxed FitMaterial: 60% Cotton, 40% PolyesterCare: Machine WashableSTYLISH COMFORTDisney children's wear guarantees the comfort and style of your kids. Our garments are given a clean finish using the softest and safest materials available. Wrap your child in style as he explores the world with fun and excitement.
